Summary: rusty colored bright glow south east sky
divs: sighting detailsnot jumping on the "band-wagon", but so glad other people have seen these objects..for the last 5 yrs have witnessed some unknown lights around the wise county area...last tues 1\7\08, at approx 0545, my husband and i were headed to work..we both noticed a very bright rusty colored "star", southeast in the sky.. something did not fit..not like other stars we had seen, and when i got home that evening did a search to see what planents could look like that..maybe mars?.. then 5yrs ago, was about a week before christmas,. headed home on highway 287 north.. ..noticed 3 bright fluoresant type green orbs in the direction of highway 51 (which would be west of 287).these were not too high in the sky.. first thought, fireworks for the holidays, but the shape and how the orbs moved in all one unit was odd.then it just went dark in sky and no more... always has bothered me, because wanted to know what these were... did not feel in danger, but just curious.. good luck in finding out the truth..
